text: وَلَمَّا جَآءَتۡ رُسُلُنَا لُوطٗا سِيٓءَ بِهِمۡ وَضَاقَ بِهِمۡ ذَرۡعٗا وَقَالَ هَٰذَا يَوۡمٌ عَصِيبٞ

translation.en: And when Our messengers, [the angels], came to Lot, he was anguished for them and felt for them great discomfort and said, "This is a trying day
translation.id: Dan ketika para utusan Kami (para malaikat) itu datang kepada Luṭ, dia merasa curiga dan dadanya merasa sempit karena (kedatangan)nya. Dia (Luṭ) berkata, "Ini hari yang sangat sulit
